Component.name: ViewLocked
Component.Description: A component which locks the position and rotation of an entity which has a Panel component to the user's view.

Vector3Attribute.name: position
Vector3Attribute.description: The position offset to apply to the object, relative to the head.

Vector3Attribute.name: rotation
Vector3Attribute.description: The rotation offset in euler angles to apply to the object, relative to the head.

BooleanAttribute.name: fillView
BooleanAttribute.description: Whether or not to add a z offset so that the panel fills the camera view across the width of the panel.
